Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 WATER STREET, CAMDEN, New Jersey, 08102-1658, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Water Works is the largest investor-owned U.S. water and wastewater utility, serving approximately 3.5 million customers in 16 states. It provides water and wastewater services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers and operates predominantly in regulated markets. The company's only nonregulated business is water services for military bases, which operates under long-term contracts.

value.name: Cheryl Norton
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
